description.en: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.ar: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.br: Uma pedra preciosa criada pelo poder mental de Offerep.
description.cns: 欧布华使用魔法时，周围环境受到影响而形成的特殊矿石
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Dieses Gestein wurde mit den mentalen Kräften von Offerep bearbeitet und umgewandelt.
description.fi: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.fil: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.fr: minerai qui a été soumis à l'influence des forces psychiques d' Offerep.
description.id: Permata yang diciptakan oleh kekuatan mental Offerep.
description.it: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.jp: オルファーが英雄戦争で究極魔法をあみだした際、その威力により周囲の自然法則さえも変質させた。エイエンブルケーブにのこされた奇石は、彼の手になるものと伝えられている。
description.kr: 오퍼엡의 정신술 사용 시 주변의 자연 환경들이 영향을 받은 후 오랫동안 변형되어 형성된 일종의 광석.
description.nl: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.pl: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.ru: Драгоценная звезда, которую Коверфильд создал силой собственного разума.
description.sp: Una gema que fue creada por el poder mental de Offerep.
description.sw: A gem which was created by the mental power of Offerep.
description.th: อัญมณีที่สร้างขึ้นจากพลังจิตของ Offerep
description.tw: 歐曄使用魔法時，周圍環境受到影響而形成的痕跡
description.vi: Một viên ngọc được tạo ra bởi sức mạnh tinh thần của Offerep.
